Package org.opengrok.indexer.util

Class Statistics

java.lang.Object
org.opengrok.indexer.util.Statistics
public class Statistics extends Object
This class is handy for logging messages (and updating metrics) about duration of a task.

  • Method Details

    • report

      public boolean report(Logger logger, Level logLevel, String msg)
      Log a message along with how much time it took since the constructor was called.
      Parameters:
      logger - logger instance
      logLevel - log level
      msg - message string
      Returns:
      whether logging was performed

    • report

      public boolean report(Logger logger, Level logLevel, String msg, String meterName)
      Log a message along with how much time it took since the constructor was called. If there is a metrics registry, it will update the timer specified by the meter name.
      Parameters:
      logger - logger instance
      logLevel - log level
      msg - message string
      meterName - name of the meter
      Returns:
      whether logging was performed
      See Also:
      • Metrics.getRegistry()

    • report

      public boolean report(Logger logger, Level logLevel, String msg, String meterName, String[] tags)
      Log a message along with how much time it took since the constructor was called. If there is a metrics registry, it will update the timer specified by the meter name.
      Parameters:
      logger - logger instance
      logLevel - log level
      msg - message string
      meterName - name of the meter
      tags - array of tags for the meter
      Returns:
      whether logging was performed
      See Also:
      • Metrics.getRegistry()

    • report

      public boolean report(Logger logger, String msg, String meterName)
      Log a message along with how much time it took since the constructor was called. If there is a metrics registry, it will update the timer specified by the meter name. The log level is INFO.
      Parameters:
      logger - logger instance
      msg - message string
      meterName - name of the meter
      Returns:
      whether logging was performed

    • report

      public boolean report(Logger logger, String msg)
      log a message along with how much time it took since the constructor was called. The log level is INFO.
      Parameters:
      logger - logger instance
      msg - message string
      Returns:
      whether logging was performed
